description.en:
In the Canglan Continent, there existed a rule: only those who managed to awaken a Martial Spirit were able to pursue the path of cultivation, and a Martial Spirit's rank was determined when it was awakened. Born in Linshui City, Qin Nan was a peerless genius who possessed great talents and was highly anticipated to become a great cultivator in the future. However, things changed when he ended up awakening the lowest-grade Martial Spirit, resulting in him being considered trash.  
  
Fortunately, when Qin Nan was struck by a ray of lightning at a young age, he coincidentally obtained the atavistic Divine Battle Spirit, which was capable of ranking up, breaking the ultimate rule of the Canglan Continent. Little did he know that his Martial Spirit possessed a great secret, which would continue to be unveiled as he learns more about the story of the Divine Battle Spirit.  
  
What is the secret behind the Divine Battle Spirit? What is the curse of the Canglan Continent? Who exactly is the Divine God of Battle?  
  
Join Qin Nan and his companions along their journey, battling against various opponents, outsmarting their enemies, and seeking the answers to unveil mysteries!  
  
“Master, please bring me along on your journey battling against the Nine Heavens, will you?”  
  
*From gravitytales.com

altTitles.th: เทพยุทธ์พลิกลิขิตสวรรค์

description.en:
In this world, respect is earned with martial arts. Weak martial artists have strengths of tens of thousands of pounds, capable of cracking boulders. And the strong ones can cut off rivers and split mountains. There are even martial kings who know everything and can travel across the universe. Martial art decides your fate as well as your life and death. The weak is humiliated while the strong looks down on the world. This is a a world where the strong bullies the weak. People's statuses are decided by the levels of their cultivation of martial arts. Each faction fights for the title of "The Strongest". Only the strong ones have the right to survive. Even if you are from the same clan or faction, if you are weak, then you will be bullied and kicked out without mercy.  
  
After a car accident, Lin Feng crosses over to this new world into the body of a young master from the powerful Lin Family.  
Will Lin Feng be used by others again or will he forge his own path in this place where, regardless of your family ties or sect, only the strong have the right to live.  


---
description.fr: Dans ce monde, le respect se gagne avec les arts martiaux. Les artistes martiaux faibles ont des forces de dizaines de milliers de pounds, capables de craquer des blocs rocheux. Et les plus forts peuvent couper les rivières et creuser des montagnes. Il y a même des rois martiaux qui savent tout et peuvent voyager à travers l'univers. L'art martial décide de votre destin ainsi que de votre vie et de votre mort. Les faibles sont humiliés tandis que les forts méprisent tout le monde. C'est un monde où les forts intimident les faibles. Les statuts des gens sont déterminés par les niveaux de culture des arts martiaux. Chaque faction se bat pour le titre du "plus fort". Seuls les forts ont le droit de survivre. Même si vous appartenez au même clan ou à la même faction, si vous êtes faible, alors vous serez persécuté et expulsé sans pitié.
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, o respeito é obtido através das artes marciais. A força de artistas marciais fracos é igual a dezenas de milhares de libras, capazes de quebrar rochas. E os fortes podem cortar rios e dividir montanhas. Há até reis marciais que conhecem tudo e podem viajar pelo universo. A arte marcial decide seu destino, bem como sua vida e sua morte. Os fracos são humilhados enquanto o olhar forte para o mundo. Este é um mundo onde os fortes intimidam os fracos. O status das pessoas é decidido pelos níveis de cultivo de artes marciais. Cada facção luta pelo título de "O mais poderoso". Apenas os fortes têm o direito de sobreviver. Mesmo se você é do mesmo clã ou facção, se você é fraco, então você será intimidado e expulso sem piedade.

description.en:
The Murim’s public enemy, the Slaughterer Demon Monarch, Yeom Se-Ak! It’s been a hundred years since he was trapped in Mount Hua after being captured by the Sword God, Han Ho.

He waited all these years for his chance to seek revenge…

The long period of time caused this incident to be forgotten by the world, and eventually, even the Yeom Se-Ak was forgotten.

But.

“Sir, what is your name…?”

A coincidental meeting, and the name of an archenemy that he said unwittingly, “H-Han Ho.”

At the end of a vain journey, an unexpected path branches out. The ultimate demon that’s in Mount Hua, Yeom Se-Ak’s choice!
description.ko:
무림공적, 천살마군 염세악!
검신 한호에게 잡혀 화산에 갇힌 지 백년.

와신상담… 절치부심… 복수무한…

세월은 이 모든 것을 잊게 하고 세상마저 그를 잊게 만들었다.
하지만.

“허면 어르신 함자가 어찌 되시는지…….”

우연한 만남, 자신도 모르게 튀어나온 원수의 이름.

“그게… 한, 한호일세.”

허무함의 끝에서 예기치 않게 꼬인 행로.

화산파 안[in]의 절세마인, 염세악의 선택!
description.ru:
Враг народа Мурима, Демон-Монарх-Убийца, Йом Се-Ак! Прошло сто лет с заточения на горе Хуа после того, как Бог Меча Хан Хо захватил его.
Все эти годы он ждал своего шанса отомстить…
Из-за того, что месть планировалась довольно долго, всё пришло к тому, что о инциденте мало кто помнил, и в конце концов Йом Се-Ак был забыт.
Но…
"Сэр, как Вас зовут?.."
Случайная встреча и имя заклятого врага, которое он невольно произнёс:
"Х-Хан Хо".
В конце бессмысленного путешествия неожиданный путь разветвляется. Высший демон, обитающий на горе Хуа, выбор Йом Се-Ака

description.en:
Monk Sanzang from the "Journey to the west" has time slipped to the present-day Korea.   
  
She has lived her lifetime constantly fighting yokai but her most dangerous opponent turns out to be just one guy?!  
  
On the orders of Buddha, Monk Sanzang and her companions pilgramaged the Western regions in search of his teachings.  
Unlike Sun Wukong, Zhu Bajie, and Sha Wujing, who hoped to become gods in recognition of their contribution, rather than being tied down to the life of Buddhism, Sanzang wanted to remain in the human world and enjoy a new life as an ordinary human.  
  
But as she was being dragged to Heaven by orders from the Buddha, she notices a strange tunnel leading to the human world in which she escapes into…  
  
And the place where she fell is the Republic of Korea's Jeju Island!  
And she meets a guy named Lee Hyun?!  
  
The time-slipped Monk Sanzang a.k.a Hyeonjeong and the tsundere Lee Hyun's turbulent romance!

Halo, the best musician of the time, suffers a traffic accident on the way to the Grammy ceremony. And when he regains consciousness, he finds himself in the body of a little Korean boy named No Hae-il. He finds himself in a completely different place and time. He confirms that No Hae-il's English name is Halo and feels a strong destiny. Halo, who entered Hae-il, proves to be a musical genius at this time as well.

First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.
description.es-la: Gu Feiyan, el tercer soberano, muere y es reencarnado en un niño llamado Li Yunxia, una completa basura que todavía no despertó sus meridianos a pesar de su edad. ¡Pero esto no detendrá al MC de alcanzar el pináculo de este mundo otra vez!
description.pt-br: Um dos imperadores marciais conferidos, Gu Feiyang, faleceu nas montanhas Tiandang e reencarnou 15 anos depois como Li Yunxiao, do estado de Tianshui, embarcando em uma jornada que desafia o céu contra os inúmeros gênios da época. Os nove níveis da Arte Marcial; os Reinos Divinos dos dez quadrantes. A partir de então, o mundo inteiro caiu no caos!

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

altTitles.pt-br: Sem querer seduzi o caçula do reino

altTitles.ru: Я случайно соблазнила младшего брата главного героя

altTitles.ja: 間違って男主人公の弟を口説いちゃった

altTitles.id: Tidak sengaja menggoda adik male lead

altTitles.zh: 不小心勾引了男主的弟弟

altTitles.es: No quise cautivar al hermano menor del protagonista masculino

altTitles.vi: Tôi Đã Vô Tình Quyến Rũ Em Trai Của Nam Chính

altTitles.en: I Accidentally Seduced the Male Lead's Younger Brother

description.en:
She possessed the mistress of the male lead in an R19 novel. In the original novel, the male lead was trash who abandoned her after getting her pregnant, saying that he belatedly realized that he loved the heroine. Fortunately, it was still before the original work started. She decided to scrap that shit herself.

"No, I don't want to," she flatly rejected Killian's offer to have an affair with him.

When he asked her why, she smiled brightly and answered, "Young Master is not my taste. If I must say, your younger brother is much preferable.”

"What? You prefer my younger brother?"

*Yeah. Not you, but your brother.*

Unlike the original, she firmly set up an iron wall, took care of Lexion, the younger brother who was abused by his elder brother, and protected the original female lead who had low-esteem from that shitty male lead.

And now that she'd already done what she had to do, she's off to go.

But a few years later–

Lexion, who had pushed out his older brother and taken the ducal title, came back to her as a beast with a decadent beauty. On top of that, he was even holding the engagement document that she had signed as a joke during their childhood.

"I've never forgotten you for a moment. Please marry me, Noona."

*No, wasn't that just for playing house?*

Every time she refuses his marriage proposal, he gently hugs her around the waist, and asks in a cold voice, "Did your taste change while I was away?"

Lexion's eyes were full of life as he asked.

It was as if when he found out who her type was, he'd kill them right away.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.es:
“No, no quiero.”

La propuesta fue rechazada como un golpe en seco.

“Confucio no es de mi agrado. Mi preferencia es el hermano menor de Confucio”.

“¿Qué? ¿A mi hermana le gusta?”

“Así es. No tú, sino tu hermano.”

===

Ese ‘hermano menor’ vino a nosotros como una bestia con una belleza trascendental. 

“Nunca te he olvidado ni por un solo momento. Por favor, cásate conmigo, hermana.”

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.id:
Dia memiliki kekasih dari pemeran utama pria dalam novel R19. Dalam novel aslinya, pemeran utama pria adalah sampah yang mencampakkannya setelah membuatnya hamil, mengatakan bahwa dia terlambat menyadari bahwa dia mencintai pahlawan wanita tersebut. Untungnya, itu masih sebelum pekerjaan aslinya dimulai. Saya memutuskan untuk menghapus omong kosong ini sendiri. *** "Tidak, aku tidak mau". Aku dengan tegas menolak tawaran Killian untuk berselingkuh dengannya. Ketika dia bertanya mengapa, saya tersenyum cerah dan menjawab. “Tuan Muda tidak sesuai dengan seleraku. Jika saya harus mengatakan, adik laki-laki Anda jauh lebih disukai. ” "Itu? Apakah kamu lebih suka adik laki-lakiku?" "Ya. Bukan kamu, tapi kakakmu." *** Berbeda dengan aslinya, saya dengan kuat membangun tembok besi, merawat Lexion, adik laki-laki yang dilecehkan oleh kakak laki-lakinya, dan melindungi pemeran utama wanita asli yang memiliki harga rendah terhadap pemeran utama pria yang tidak bermutu itu. Dan sekarang setelah saya melakukan apa yang harus saya lakukan, saya akan pergi. Namun beberapa tahun kemudian, Lexion, yang melewati kakak laki-lakinya dan duduk di kursi sang duke, kembali kepadaku seperti binatang buas dengan kecantikan dekaden. Selain itu, dia bahkan memegang dokumen jaminan yang saya tandatangani sebagai lelucon saat masih kecil. “Aku tidak pernah melupakanmu sedetik pun. Tolong menikahlah denganku, noona.” Tidak, bukankah itu hanya untuk bermain rumah? Setiap kali saya menolak lamaran pernikahannya, dia dengan lembut memeluk pinggang saya dan bertanya kepada saya dengan suara yang begitu dingin. "Apakah seleramu berubah saat aku pergi?" Mata Lexion penuh dengan kehidupan saat dia bertanya. Ini seperti ketika dia mengetahui siapa tipeku, dia akan langsung membunuhnya.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.ru:
Обычный офисный работник перевоплотился в романе 18+ в второстепенного персонажа, который изначально был любовницей главного героя. В оригинальном романе главный герой бросил ее после того, как она забеременела, сказав, что запоздало понял, что любит главную героиню. Теперь у нее есть шанс изменить судьбу этого персонажа и отказать главному герою: «Я на это не соглашусь!»

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.vi:
Tôi đã sở hữu cơ thể người yêu của nam chính trong một cuốn tiểu thuyết 19+. Trong nguyên tác, nam chính đích thị là một tên rác rưởi. Anh ta đã vứt bỏ cô sau khi làm cô có thai, còn bonus thêm câu anh ta đã vô tình rơi vào lưới tình của nữ chính. May thay, hiện giờ nguyên tác chưa bắt đầu. Vậy nên, tôi đã quyết định tự mình loại bỏ tên rác rưởi đó. *** “Không thích” Tôi đã nhanh chóng từ chối lời đề nghị làm người yêu từ Killian. Anh ta muốn hỏi tôi lý do với khuôn mặt đầy dấu chấm hỏi, tôi chỉ nhẹ nhàng nở nụ cười rạng rở và trả lời. “Thiếu gia đây không phải gu tôi. Gu tôi chính là em trai của thiếu gia cơ” “Gì? Em thích em trai của ta?” Chính xác rồi đó anh trai. Không phải anh, mà là em trai của anh cơ. *** Không như nguyên tác, tôi đã xây dựng một bức tường thành chắc chắn nhằm ngăn chặn tên thiếu gia kia. Bắt đầu chăm sóc cho Lexion, người bị anh trai của mình ngược đãi và cũng chính là người đã bảo vệ nữ chính. Và khi đã hoàn thành công việc, tôi đã nhanh chóng tẩu thoát khỏi dinh thự công tước. Nhưng trôi qua mấy năm. Lexion, người đã đẩy cái tên khốn kia ra khỏi vị trí công tước và tự mình ngồi chễm chệ trên vị trí đó đã trở thành một con thú và đến tìm tôi. Đồng thời còn mang theo một tờ giấy đính hôn có sẵn chữ ký như trò đùa khi nhỏ. “Em chưa hề quên chị dù chỉ một phút. Chị kết hôn với em nhé” Điều đó chẳng phải chỉ để con nít chơi với nhau à? Mỗi lần từ chối, anh ta lại bắt đầu quấn lấy eo của tôi mà ôm. Quá mệt mỏi, tôi đã hỏi anh ta với vẻ mặt nghiêm túc. “Chẳng lẽ em đã thay đổi gu trong thời gian chị vắng mặt?” Đôi mắt của Lexion chứa đầy sát khí khi tôi cất lời. Cứ như thể khi anh ta phát hiện ra gu của tôi là ai, anh ta sẽ giết người đó ngay lập tức.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.zh:
“公爵不是我喜欢的类型，我喜欢的是公爵您的弟弟。” 果断拒绝油腻海王公爵的的提议，这一世我不会做你的情人，没想到随便使用的借口，却让对方上了心。那个小软萌弟弟长大后居然变成了一个病娇美男？“姐姐不是说喜欢我吗？”这个婚约该怎么拒绝呀！

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.pt-br:
**“Jovem mestre, você não faz o meu tipo… Eu quero o seu irmão!”**

“Você não faz o meu tipo, jovem mestre. Prefiro muito mais o seu irmão mais novo.”
“O quê? O meu irmão?”
“Isso mesmo, o seu irmão, não você.”

===
 Quando criança, eu assinei um contrato de casamento com este “irmão mais novo”, eu só não contava que…
“Eu nunca me esqueci de você, por favor, case-se comigo!”
Ele disse isso enquanto segurava o contrato que foi assinado quando éramos crianças, mas espera… não era tudo apenas uma brincadeira??!

---
"Não." Rejeitei categoricamente a oferta do canalha de ter um caso comigo. “O jovem mestre não é meu tipo. Meu tipo é seu irmão.” "O quê? Meu irmão é o seu tipo?" Garfos. Não você, mas seu irmão. * * * O 'irmão' veio até mim, uma fera da decadência. “Nunca me esqueci de você nem por um momento, quero que se case comigo, irmã.” Segurando os papéis de noivado que assinei de brincadeira na minha infância. Não, isso não era para uma brincadeira de criança? "Você mudou seus gostos enquanto eu estava fora?" Os olhos de Lexion estavam cheios de emoção quando ele perguntou. É como se ele soubesse do meu novo gosto, ele me mataria imediatamente.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)

description.en:
The original story which the popular manga series Horimiya is based on.  
  
It's said that youth is bittersweet, but maybe it's just bitter? Kyoko Hori is a flashy high school girl, who, despite her ostentatious appearance, excels in academics and loves her family. Izumi Miyamura is a bland high school boy, who, regardless of not wanting to stand out in class, secretly wears piercings outside of school and has a large body tattoo. One day, Miyamura finds Hori's little brother injured and helps him back to Hori's house, where the relationship between Hori and Miyamura begins with Hori's discovery of Miyamura's secret, and his of her's.  
  


---
description.ru:
В школе Хори-сан – пример для всех – красивая, дружелюбная девушка с высокой успеваемостью, но это лишь одна её сторона, другую – она тщательно скрывает. Её родителей-трудоголиков часто не бывает дома, так что Хори вынуждена всё своё свободное время посвящать домашним делам и присмотру за младшим братом.  
Миямура-кун кажется одноклассникам мрачным отаку в очках, однако на самом деле он очень вежливый и спокойный человек, и ему трудно даётся учёба. Миямура не любит выделяться, так что усердно скрывает, что у него есть пирсинг и татуировки.  
Однажды случай сводит их вместе за пределами школы. Хори едва узнаёт в нём своего одноклассника, а Миямура поражён тем, насколько она отличается от того образа, что поддерживает в школе. Теперь им двоим есть с кем поделиться своими тайнами и раскрыть настоящих себя.  
  


---

Chapters 1 - 140 are the main story.  
Chapters 141 onwards are extras.

altTitles.ur: Sath ki kursi par beithne wali mujhe "Un Ankhoñ" se deikhti he

description.en:
While you were admiring the girl in the next seat, she might be eyeing you up, too…? A new kind of “neighborly” short-form pure love comedy!

(Source: Sunday Webry, translated)
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

description.en: Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of vengeance”.
description.pt-br: Devido à Expansão da Tecnologia, as bruxas que eram amigas do povo se tornaram desnecessárias. Humanos, que temiam o poder não científico, começam uma caça às bruxas… E um menino humano que teve sua amada bruxa morta, se torna o “Mago da Vingança”.

altTitles.ja: ダンス・ダンス・ダンスール

description.en: Junpei is happily snoozing away during his sister's ballet recital when a male ballet dancer steps onto the stage. Moved by the strength and skills the dancer displays, the boy discovers his love for this art. But after a certain tragedy happens, he vows to leave his past behind and turn into the epitome of manliness. What will he do when his love for ballet reignites?!
description.ja: 主人公・村尾潤平は中学二年生。幼い頃にバレエに魅了されるも、父の死をきっかけに「男らしくならねば」とその道を諦める。バレエへの未練を隠しながら格闘技・ジークンドーを習い、クラスの人気者となった潤平だが、彼の前に、ある日転校生の美少女・五代都が現れる。母親がバレエスタジオを経営する都に、バレエへの興味を見抜かれ、一緒にやろうよと誘われるが――！？すべてを犠牲にしたものだけが、立つことを許される世界。重力に逆らい、美しく高く跳ぶものたちよ、抗いがたきその衝動に、身を捧げよ――

description.en: Planets dying, gods falling. “Anomalies” and “Calamities” invade the human world. As a dark age descends, Shen Ye finds himself flung into this strange new reality. To his surprise, his power is to summon a door – a door leading to countless worlds, offering him a chance to adventure and train across the multiverse! Beyond the door, he encounters a mysterious skeleton with an unknown past…
description.zh: 星球死亡，众神陨落。“异常”与“灾祸”入侵人类世界。黑暗时代来临之际，沈夜穿越到这个异世界，惊奇得发现，自己的异能是召唤出一扇门，这扇门通往诸天万界，可以去不同世界冒险历练！他在门的另一边，结识了一具身份来历成迷的骷髅……
description.pt-br: Planetas morrendo, deuses caindo. “Anomalias” e “Calamidades” invadem o mundo humano. À medida que a era das trevas se aproxima, Shen Ye se vê lançado nesta estranha nova realidade. Para sua surpresa, seu poder é invocar uma porta – uma porta que leva a incontáveis ​​mundos, oferecendo-lhe a chance de se aventurar e treinar através do multiverso! Além da porta, ele encontra um esqueleto misterioso com um passado desconhecido...

description.en:
Raimon Middle School 's soccer club captain, Endou Mamoru is in a pinch - his club is about to be destroyed! Literally! To avert the wrecking ball and disbanding of the club, his team must win against the toughest soccer team in the area - Teikoku. Will Endou and his team meet a crushing defeat or will a mysterious transfer student with a fiery kick save them from disaster?!  
  
Won the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Best Children's Manga.
description.pt-br:
O capitão do clube de futebol da Escola Média Raimon, Endou Mamoru, está em apuros – seu clube está prestes a ser destruído! Literalmente! Para evitar a demolição e a dissolução do clube, seu time precisa vencer a equipe de futebol mais forte da região – Teikoku. Endou e seu time sofrerão uma derrota esmagadora ou um misterioso aluno transferido com um chute ardente os salvará do desastre?!

Ganhou o 34º Prêmio Anual de Mangá Kodansha de Melhor Mangá Infantil.

altTitles.en: Ma'am, Your Mask Has Fallen Off Again

description.en:
Mother always said to Qinran: "Your stepfather is from a famous family, your eldest brother is a genius, and your sister is a top student in her high school. You, a country bumpkin, don't embarrass them."

Everyone with status in the capital received a warning from Mr. Juan of the Cheng family: "Mr. Juan's wife is from the countryside and doesn't understand our current situation, and she has a bad temper. In short, everyone should be extra patient."

Until one day, when Master Juan was investigating a certain big boss, his men fell into a confused silence while looking at one of the waistcoats of his sister-in-law who claimed to know nothing…

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.vi: Ma Hoàng Trác Nhất Phàm vì nhặt được một truyền thừa của Thượng Cổ Ma Đế, mà dẫn đến họa sát thân. Sau khi được trọng sinh vào một cơ thể khác, cũng bởi vì tâm ma của chủ nhân cơ thể cũ, mà không còn cách nào khác, phải làm quản gia cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé. Cùng xem một đại ma hoàng đầy thủ đoạn tàn độc, sẽ làm thế nào để khiến cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé trở mình thành một gia tộc đứng trên tất cả.
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

title.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attacks

altTitles.zh: 我的假女友正全力防御她们的进攻

altTitles.en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attack
My Fake Girlfriends are using me as a Shield

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Jia Nüyou Zheng Quanli Fangyu Tamen De Jingong

altTitles.de: Meine falschen Freundinnen benutzen mich als Schutzschild

description.en: One day, I was suddenly confessed to by a girl, and in order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!

title.en: I'm Being Mistaken for a Soccer Genius

description.en: The Korean boy, Lee Jian, who was released from a prestigious youth team in Italy, spends his days idling away as a substitute even after arriving at the youth team of AC Firenze, almost as if he were running away.As usual, he boasts to his childhood friend, Kim Jiwoo, claiming to be a genius, but then he hears the shocking news that Jiwoo is coming to Italy to study abroad. Determined not to disappoint his precious (?) friend Jiwoo, Jian sets his sights on becoming a starter...
The story of a generation filled with romance and chaos.

altTitles.th: แบล็กโคลเวอร์

description.en:
Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church, and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus. However, as they grew up, some differences between them became plain. Yuno was a genius with magic, with amazing power and control, while Asta could not use magic at all, and tried to make up for his lack by training physically. When they received their Grimoires at age 15, Yuno got a spectacular book with a four-leaf clover (most people receive a three-leaf-clover), while Asta received nothing at all. However, when Yuno was threatened, the truth about Asta's power was revealed, he received a five-leaf clover Grimoire, a "black clover"! Now the two friends are heading out in the world, both seeking the same goal!

---

**Links:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802) (special)  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) (anime)
description.fr:
Asta et Yuno ont été abandonné ensemble à la même église, et sont inséparables depuis. Enfants, ils promirent qu'ils seront en compétition pour voir qui sera le prochain Mage Empereur. Toutefois, en grandissant, quelques différences entre eux émergèrent. Yuno était un génie avec la magie avec un pouvoir et un contrôle incroyable, pendant qu'Asta ne pouvait pas du tout utiliser la magie, et essayait de compenser cela en entrainant son corps. Quand ils reçoivent leur grimoire à 15 ans, Yuno obtient ub kivre spectaculaire avec un trèfle à 4 feuilles (la plupart des gens reçoivent un trèfle à 3 feuilles), pendant qu'Asta ne reçoit rien du tout. Toutefois, quand Yuno fut menaçé, la vérité derrière le pouvoir d'Asta fut révélée. Il reçoit un grimoire avec un trèfle à 5 feuilles, un "trèfle noir" *(un "black clover")* ! Maintenant, les deux amis s'en vont vers la capitale, les deux cherchant le même objectif !


**Liens:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802)  *(special)* 
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) *(anime)*
description.pl: Asta to młody chłopak, który marzy o zostaniu największym magiem w królestwie. Jest tylko jeden problem: nie potrafi używać żadnej magii. Na szczęście otrzymuje Pięciolistną Koniczynę, niesamowicie rzadką księgę czarów, dzięki której chłopak zyskuje moc niwelowania wszelkiej magii. Czy ktoś, kto nie używa magii, może zostać Imperatorem Magii, magiem nad magami? Jedno wiemy na pewno: Asta nigdy się nie podda.Portuguese (BR) / Português (BR)Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!
description.ru: В мире, где магия – это всё, рождается мальчик Астер, который не в состоянии использовать какую-либо магию. Ещё ребенком он был оставлен у порога бедной церкви. Сейчас ему 15, и, чтобы доказать свою силу и сдержать обещание, данное другу, он стремится стать Королём Чародеев!
description.pt-br: Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!

description.en:
Taepyeong, a promising surgery professor, was reborn in the 19th-century English countryside village of Upton, retaining all of his memories from his past life.

He once again nurtured his dream of becoming a doctor. However, he was only met with...

Ha Maru, a butcher working at a livestock company, is invited by his supervisor to go on a business trip to Japan. However, he soon discovers that the place he has been sent to is a criminal organization run by the Yakuza. In order to survive in this dangerous environment, Ha Maru struggles and gradually awakens his hidden talent for using knives. The butcher, who has now set foot in the underworld, challenges the pinnacle of the criminal world to stay alive.

Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.ru: Пробравшись на невольничий корабль, Юлиан отправляется на континент вместе с сотней рабов, жаждущих свободы... Но что ждёт его впереди?!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

description.en: Army veteran's last go at the obstacle course turns lethal after a simple fall. A goddess presents an opportunity at new life as a hero! The protagonist ain't having any of it, he was supposed to retire and become a civilian. The arrogant Goddess drops him down to survive while having her own evil schemes. How will his new life progress after encountering another Goddess, a spy and his past life's junior?

altTitles.en: An Angel Flew Down to Me!

altTitles.ja: 私に天使が舞い降りた!

description.en: The four-panel comedy manga's story centers on Miyako Hoshino, a shy college student and otaku. Miyako's younger sister Hinata, who is a fifth grader, has a classmate and friend named Hana. When they meet, Miyako falls for Hana at first sight.
description.es-la: La historia de este manga cómico 4-Koma se centra en Miyako Hoshino, una tímida estudiante universitaria y otaku. La hermana pequeña de Miyako, Hinata, que está en quinto grado, tiene una compañera de clase y amiga llamada Hana. Cuando se conocen, Miyako se enamora de Hana a primera vista...

description.en: A dramatic story set in the past of Gensokyo, before the creation of the spell card rules, following around a young Reimu. Unofficial and non-canon. Published in the web edition of Strange Creators of Outer World.

altTitles.ja: ナンバエムジーファイブ

description.en: Born in a family of delinquents, Nanba Tsuyoshi is expected to succeed his older brother as the strongest delinquent in school. Unbeknownst to his family, however, he decides to enroll in the top high school in town to live as a normal high schooler. Can he maintain his double life as the strongest delinquent in town and as a normal high schooler?

altTitles.pt-br: As Regras De Um Bom Garoto

description.en:
Dead Mansion, a Russian private orphanage, trains children to become agents.

The legend of Dead Mansion, codename Sean, which was thought to have been lost due to a "shipping error", has appeared in Korea...?
description.ko:
어린아이들을 요원으로 양성하는 러시아 사설 보육원 '데드멘션'.

그리고 오배송으로 잃어버린 줄 알았던 데드멘션의 전설 '코드네임.
description.pt-br: Um orfanato particular na Rússia chamado “Mansão da Morte” treina crianças pequenas para se tornarem agentes. Essa é uma história que se passa no mesmo universo de Lookism.

title.en: Veil Blue to Kuchinashi no Hanataba

altTitles.ja: ベールブルーと梔子の花束

altTitles.en: Veil Blue and Bouquet of Gardenias

description.en:
Mugi Hinata has had a physical relationship with Suku Oumi, a popular professional Go player, since their school days. They can only meet when in heat and have yet to become lovers. Even so, they are happy just to be together. Then one day, he witnesses shocking news about Oumi...?

High-spec Go player α × Servile bookshop clerk Ω, an Omegaverse story which is sure to make you swoon.

title.en: I Only Want to Beat You

altTitles.en: I Want to Beat You, Oh Roji
I Want to Defeat You, Oh Roji

description.en: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
description.uk: Головний герой Лі Ґіґо, який жодного разу в житті не програв, і головна героїня, яка перемогла його, О Роджі. Хто в підсумку стане переможцем в цьому «парі»?
description.es-la: El protagonista masculino que nunca ha sido derrotado en su vida 'gana', la heroína femenina 'solo' que hizo ese guiño pierde por primera vez ¿Quién será el ganador de esta 'apuesta'?

title.en: My Female Disciples are all Future Masters of the Heavens

altTitles.en: My Female Apprentices Are All Big Shots From the Future

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ De Nǚ Túdìmen Dōu Shì Wèilái Zhū Tiān Dà Lǎo

altTitles.zh: 我的女徒弟们都是未来诸天大佬

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Nü Tudi Men Dou Shi Weilai Zhu Tian Dalao

altTitles.zh-hk: 諸天聖者〜崩壊世界と女弟子〜

altTitles.tr: Kadın Çıraklarımın Hepsi Gelecekteki Büyük Tanrılar

altTitles.en: My Female Apprentices Are All Big Ss From the Future

altTitles.vi: Các Nữ Đồ Đệ Của Ta Đều Là Chư Thiên Đại Lão Tương Lai

altTitles.es-la: Mis discípulas son las futuros grandezas de los cielos

description.en:
The historical timeline is facing collapse, and the strongest Taoist master was sent back to one hundred thousand years ago with his entire body of cultivation. Ding~ Your system-assigned mission is here, it's up to you to entice all the female apprentices!


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (KuaiKan)](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/13619)
- [Official japanese (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82263)
description.tr: Tarihin uzun nehri çöküşle karşı karşıya, en güçlü Taoist rahip yüz bin yıl önceye geri döndü. Ding ~ Sistem görev verdi ve gelecekteki tanrıları çırağınız yapın!
description.zh: 历史长河面临崩溃，最强道尊带着一身修为回到十万年前？叮~您的系统任务到了，收服女徒弟的任务就交给你了！

title.en: I Was Immediately Mistaken for a Monster Genius Actor

altTitles.pt-br: Eu fui confundido como um ator gênio monstro

description.en:
One day, Kang Woo-jin suddenly gains the ability to enter a subspace when he reads a script or scenario, and to become the character himself through the subspace. 

And then, at an audition location where he followed his friend, he happened to show the acting he experienced through the subspace…?
description.ko:
평범한 소시민 강우진에게 어느 날 갑자기대본이나 시나리오를 보면 아공간에 들어갈 수 있고,아공간을 통해 배역 자체가 될 수 있는 능력이 생긴다.

그리고 친구를 따라간 오디션 장소에서우연히 아공간을 통해 경험한 연기를 보여주게 되었는데…?

description.en: Pah Doyeon, a college student living in an old apartment building, gets used to the thugs coming to her neighbor's door every day. One day, when she sees the thugs trying to break into her neighbor's house, she unwittingly hides her next-door neighbor, Jinju, in her apartment... Looking at Jinju, who is much older than her, Doyeon gradually becomes engulfed in an unknown desire. How will their awkward cohabitation end?

This tongue-in-cheek semi-autobiography follows the absurdly gruesome adventures of a lonely boy and his singularly crazed family. His escape from the madness that surrounds him is his collection of pickled animal and human body parts, to which he adds as one family member after another meet with a grotesque and sometimes terrifyingly funny death... (Source: AniList)

"Alma mater, home town, blood ties—they're all but a façade!" The war against organized crime waged by the government has failed miserably… And the world turned into a battlefield of mayhem ruled by one's fists. The one who unified this hell, Chairman of the Taejin Group, "Jin Young-ui," has decided to open a competition of man, "Festival of Warriors" in search for a successor. Will our unemployed thug "Kang Dae-oh" rise to the top of the pyramid?!
"Spring! My college debut! The blossoming of my sexuality! Even now, I can't cum without being harassed by them." An unfortunate story in the spring of youth.
description.ja: 春! 大学デビューだ! 性癖開花だ! 未だに僕は、彼女たちにいじめられないと射精ができないんだ――。哀しきフルボッキ青春譚。

title.en: I Became a First-Class Guide Thanks to My Childhood Friends

altTitles.zh: 靠发小我变身顶级向导

description.en: [The twin brothers love me too much. What should I do?] D-class guide Qiao Yang, because of a drunken accident, discovered that he could use the two A-class sentinels, his childhood friends Zheng Jia and Zheng Yan, to enhance his own class. In order to retain this rare S-class status, he chose to conceal his exploitation of them. However, during the repeated interaction with the two, he gradually becomes aware of their feelings towards him...

Stinky tofu, durian, surstromming’s era is over. have you heard? cooking that’s so bad that you could die on the spot! but skill is increasing!?

Tera, whose cooking boasts the best(?) taste in all dimensions, through the bravest yoo seungwoo’s help, has come to peaceful(?) earth.

Endure it! if you eat it and don’t die, your level will go up! and then on behalf of me, protect the earth!

‘Extraordinary restaurant’ is open even when the world is going to end.
description.ko:
취두부, 두리안, 수르스트뢰밍의 시대는 갔다.
들어는 봤는가? 문자 그대로 죽을 만큼 맛없는 요리!
하지만 능력이 오른다!?

전 차원 최고(?)의 맛을 자랑하는 테라의 요리가
최강의 용사, 유승우의 손에 의해 평화로운(?) 지구를 찾아온다.

인내하라! 먹고 죽지만 않으면 허약한 당신도 레벨이 쑥쑥!
그리고 나 대신 지구를 지켜라!


'괴식식당'은 세상이 멸망해도 영업합니다!

title.en: Choujigen Game Neptune: The Animation - Hello New World - Yuusha Hon

altTitles.en: Hyperdimension Neptunia: The Animation - Hello New World - Hero Book

altTitles.ja: 超次元ゲイム ネプテューヌ はろーにゅーわーるど 勇者本 (書籍)

altTitles.es-la: Subiendo de nivel con las mejores habilidades

description.en:
In the year 2020, humanity faces a crisis as Earth is attacked by unidentified monsters. Players prepare for the attack by challenging the Labyrinth that appeared. They can choose four options:

Easy Mode, where anyone can survive; Normal Mode, where you must work to survive; Hard Mode, where only 1% could survive; and Solo Mode, the harshest difficulty.

Kang TaeSan, the strongest Easy Mode player cleared the Labyrinth using an unconventional approach and acquired skills others could not: [ Addition, Multiplication, Attack Nullification, Ultimate Judgement...].

But because he chose Easy Mode, his power was lacking. Unable to prevent the extinction of humanity, he lay dying. A miraculous chance appears.

"This time I'll definitely become stronger."

Challenging the Labyrinth again, this is Skill-based Player Kang TaeSan's Solo Mode Attack Record!

altTitles.ja: クールな妻のさーちゃん

description.en: A romcom featuring 2 childhood friends who'll get married one day and the process that leads to that point.
description.es: Una comedia romántica protagonizada por dos amigos de la infancia que un día se casarán y el proceso que conduce a ese punto.
description.es-la: Una comedia romántica protagonizada por dos amigos de la infancia que un día se casarán y el proceso que conduce a ese punto.
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica com dois amigos de infância que um dia vão se casar e o processo que leva até esse ponto.

title.en: Secretly More Powerful than the Hero

altTitles.en: I Was More Overpowered Than the Hero, so I Hid My Power!

altTitles.es-la: Era más fuerte que el héroe así que oculté mi poder

altTitles.th: แกร่งเกินผู้กล้า แต่ซ่าไม่ได้

description.en:
From a young age, I've always dreamed of being that “unassuming hero,” appearing ordinary but possessing unmatched strength. But one day, fate took a turn when I was hit by an eight-ton truck, and suddenly, reincarnation was on the table! 

"What would you like to be in your next life?" asked the goddess of reincarnation. Eagerly, I replied, "I wish to become a wimp, but secretly OP!”

She granted my wish, but with an unexpected twist: if anyone ever uncovers my true abilities, my heart will explode! 

This isn't quite the “secretly-OP-wimp-life” I had in mind…

title.en: Ume to Momo no Futsuu no Kurashi

altTitles.ja: うめともものふつうの暮らし

description.en:
Ume and Momo, the two cat sisters, share their lives under one roof.
Their days may seem uneventful, but within those moments, they discover countless sources of happiness and joy.
description.ja:
ねこっぽい姉妹のうめとももは二人暮らし中。
なんでもない日々を積み重ねて、
嬉しいことや楽しいことをたくさん見つけていきます。

description.en:
A miraculous story that saves the world with the power of "stone"!

A mysterious power resides in the crystal possessed by Akira Amachi, a boy who is knowledgeable about stones. Using that power, Akira decides to solve various cases!     The first episode is about a train derailment! ? A train traveling at breakneck speed heads towards the collapsed railway bridge... Will Akira be able to save the people on the train??　
Akira's miraculous story begins now!!!

title.en: Shokuba no Onnanoko ni Toushisuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 職場の女の子に投資する話

altTitles.en: A Story About Investing in a Girl at the Workplace

description.en:
Hatamoto Ikuto, the manager of the local bookstore "BOOK FOREST", is an otaku who can't resist spending money on his favorite characters in games.
Todoroki Miran, the part-time leader, looks up to him but can't understand his obsession with spending on in-game things.
When Ikuto claims, "For me, spending money is an investment", Miran teases, "If that's the case, how about you invest in me...?"
As the two navigate a cycle of investment and returns, the distance between their hearts begins to shrink.
A unique and charming investment-themed romantic comedy!

(Source: Melonbooks, edited)
description.ja: 街の書店「BOOK FOREST」で店長を務める畑本育人は、ゲームの「推し」キャラに課金してしまうオタク気質。バイトリーダーの轟ミランは、店長に憧れるものの、データに課金することだけは理解できない。「オレにとって課金は投資だ」と話す育人に、「それならあたしにも投資…して?」と話すミランだが…。投資と還元を繰り返し、2人の心の距離が揺れ動く――新感覚の投資ラブコメ！

altTitles.th: ความยิ่งใหญ่ในศิลปะการต่อสู้

description.en: True Heavens Continent is a place where those with great power can move mountains and overturn seas, kick the stars and step on the moon, punch through the sky and even shatter the earth itself! Ye Ming, a commoner born into a side branch within his family, sincerely and diligently tried to become stronger, hoping to avenge his parents’ deaths. As fate would have it, he obtained the "Divine Spirit Cloak", ingested the "Foundation Establishment Divine Pill", and cultivated the "Omnipotent Sutra". With his newfound power, Ye Ming begins his path of vengeance, mercilessly slaughtering any martial artists that dare stand in his way!In the face of deadly threats all across the continent, such as the Immortal Dynasty, the Great Eternal Sect, the Giant Barren Demon, and the Supreme Demon God, Ye Ming is determined that nothing will stop him! Whether god or demon, Ye Ming fears nothing! “I shall be the one who decides my own destiny!”
description.es: Ye Ming, a estrela em ascensão da Família Ye é considerado um gênio entre seus companheiros. Mas ele foi enganado por seu primo ciumento e ele cortou seus meridianos, aleijou suas habilidades e o abanou impiedosamente. Mas Ye Ming nunca desiste, porque ele sacrificaria tudo para se vingar de seus pais falecidos que foram assassinados pela família Huang. Mas ele não sabe que é considerado uma dor no pescoço para a família Ye, e uma grande conspiração paira na escuridão…
description.ru: Мин Е, восходящая звезда семьи Е, - гений среди своих сверстников-культиваторов. Но его двоюродный брат повредил ему меридианы, искалечил и безжалостно порезал сухожилия. Мин Е не сдается, потому что он пожертвовал бы всем, чтобы отомстить за своих умерших родителей, которые были убиты семьей Хуан. Он не знает, что его считают занозой в шее для семьи Е и хотят его убрать…
description.zh: 天元大陆，有大能力者可移山倒海，踢星踏月，拳破青天，脚碎大地！ 叶铭，一介凡流，庶子出身，为报血仇，自强不息。 机缘之下，获“神灵宝衣”，服“筑基神丹”，修“通天经图”。 心诚志竖，勇猛精进，凡挡修武之路者，杀无赦！ 不朽皇朝，万古大教，洪荒巨妖，擎天魔神，面对这漫天神魔，他无所畏惧，我命在我不在天
description.pt-br: O True Heavens Continent é um lugar onde aqueles com grande poder podem mover montanhas e derrubar mares, chutar as estrelas e pisar na lua, perfurar o céu e até mesmo destruir a própria terra! Ye Ming, um plebeu nascido em um ramo secundário de sua família, tentou sincera e diligentemente se tornar mais forte, na esperança de vingar a morte de seus pais. Como quis o destino, ele obteve a “Capa do Espírito Divino”, ingeriu a “Pílula Divina do Estabelecimento de Fundação” e cultivou o “Sutra Onipotente”. Com seu novo poder, Ye Ming inicia seu caminho de vingança, massacrando impiedosamente qualquer artista marcial que ouse ficar em seu caminho! Diante de ameaças mortais em todo o continente, como a Dinastia Imortal, a Grande Seita Eterna, o Gigante Estéril Demônio, e o Deus Demônio Supremo, Ye Ming está determinado a que nada o deterá! Seja deus ou demônio, Ye Ming não teme nada! “Serei eu quem decidirá meu próprio destino!

altTitles.th: เซอร์แวมพ์

description.en: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.
description.ja: 高校１年生・城田真昼が道ばたで拾った一匹の可愛い黒猫・クロの正体は、「サーヴァンプ」という下僕の吸血鬼。しかも性格は超ひきこもりニート系。契約によってクロの主人となった真昼は、吸血鬼同士の争いに巻き込まれ戦うはめになるのだが……？

description.en: Short manga posted by Imo Ichirou [@cheesesama24] on Twitter.
